PackageOracle.name: DA_TICKET_REASON
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_TICKET_REASON
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.633839000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,code_sequence_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_ticket_reason;

body.name: DA_TICKET_REASON
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_TICKET_REASON
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.22.643935000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,code_sequence_num IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket_reason.add, parms=' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || ticket_reason_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || code_sequence_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_ticket_reason a
(
a.ticket_interaction_id
,a.ticket_reason_cd
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.code_sequence_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.ticket_interaction_id
,add.ticket_reason_cd
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.code_sequence_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket_reason.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,ticket_interaction_id IN NUMBER
,ticket_reason_cd IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_ticket_reason.del, parms=' || ticket_interaction_id || '|' || ticket_reason_cd || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_ticket_reason a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.ticket_interaction_id = del.ticket_interaction_id
AND a.ticket_reason_cd = del.ticket_reason_cd
AND a.data_source_type_cd = del.data_source_type_cd
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_ticket_reason.del');

END del;

END da_ticket_reason;
